component.name: erpEntityConverter
component.property: #{erpEntityLoader}

component.name: rootAccountingList
component.property: select accounting from Accounting accounting where accounting.level = 1

component.name: rootCashAccountingList
component.property: select accounting from Accounting accounting where accounting.id = '#{runParam.getStringParamValue('erp.finance.cashAccount')}'

component.name: rootBankAccountingList
component.property: select accounting from Accounting accounting where accounting.id = '#{runParam.getStringParamValue('erp.finance.bankAccount')}'

component.name: cashAccountingList
component.property: select accounting from Accounting accounting where accounting.id like '#{runParam.getStringParamValue('erp.finance.cashAccount')}%'

component.name: bankAccountingList
component.property: select accounting from Accounting accounting where accounting.id like '#{runParam.getStringParamValue('erp.finance.bankAccount')}%'

component.name: allAccountingList
component.property: select accounting from Accounting accounting

component.name: allStoreList
component.property: select store from Store store

component.name: storeList
component.property: select store from Store store where store.enable = true

component.name: unitGroupList
component.property: select distinct unitGroup from UnitGroup unitGroup left join fetch unitGroup.resUnits

component.name: customerAreaList
component.property: select ca from CustomerArea ca

component.name: validMiddleManList
component.property: select middleMan from MiddleMan middleMan

component.name: customerLevelList
component.property: select customerLevel from CustomerLevel customerLevel order by customerLevel.priority

component.name: validTransCorpList
component.property: select transCorp from TransCorp transCorp where enable=true

component.name: validCarsList
component.property: select cars from Cars cars where enable=true

component.name: validResList
component.property: select res from Res res where enable=true

component.name: customerNameList
component.property: select distinct customer.name from Customer customer

component.name: validFactoryList
component.property: select factory from Factory factory where enable=true

component.name: allFactoryList
component.property: select factory from Factory factory

component.name: allBankAccountList
component.property: select bankAccount from BankAccount bankAccount

component.name: validBankAccountList
component.property: select bankAccount from BankAccount bankAccount where enable=true

component.name: validRebateProgramList
component.property: select rebateProgram from RebateProgram rebateProgram where enable=true

component.name: allRebateProgramList
component.property: select rebateProgram from RebateProgram rebateProgram

component.name: notCheckSaleCertificateList
component.property: select saleCertificate from SaleCertificate saleCertificate where date >= '#{accountDateHelper.displayBeginDate}' order by saleCertificate.code
